hspage.title: How to organize a music collection

pagecontent.p: Before trying to organize your music collection, you must first build it in musicGuru. Once you did that, you can follow the steps below. Note that the steps below gives you one, vanilla flavored way to organize your collection, but, with musicGuru, you can organize it in virtually any way.

ol.li: Click on the checkbox next to every location in the Locations pane.
In the menu, click on Design|Mass Rename.
Wait for the rename operation to complete.
